formulas.name: fxAccSvcTypes
formulas.expression: IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Dental_Office.Service_Type__c} , "IVS" ), "IVS | ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Dental_Office.Service_Type__c} , "IVS - AP" ), "IVS | ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Dental_Office.Service_Type__c} , "IVS - NP Only" ), "IVS | ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Dental_Office.Service_Type__c} , "VBS" ), "VBS | ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Dental_Office.Service_Type__c} , "Patient Portion" ), "Patient Portion", null )

Flow.label: PSB Submission 2024 update

fields.name: ExitandCorrecttext
fields.fieldText: Please review the following information. If any PMT information is incorrect, please exit the flow and review your PMT records.

fields.name: DisplayTotalRev
fields.fieldText:
Name: {!fxPSBName}

{!DentalOffice}

Type: {!Type_of_PSB}

Month of Work: {!varMonth}

Year of Work: {!varYear}

fields.name: ConfirmIVSValues
fields.fieldText:

Eligibility Updates: {!varTotalEligUpdates}

Urgent Complete Breakdowns: {!varTotUrgBreak}

Urgent Eligibility Updates: {!varTotUrgElig}

Total Errors - NPU: {!varTotErrNPU}

Total Errors - PPL: {!varTotErrPPL}

Monthly Total: {!varTotMonTot}

fields.fieldText: Please add any other Information to explain any discrepancies or additional information
